snippet.title: Adventures of Lolo (HAL, 1989) - NES Gameplay
snippet.description:
Adventures of Lolo takes place in the country of Eden, where the Great Devils Evil Empire is wreaking havoc once again. Princess Lala leaves to seek help from Lolo, and on the way back to Eden, King Egger himself appears to kidnap Lala right in front of Lolo. In order to save Lala and the country of Eden, Lolo arrives at the Castle of Egger and makes his way through ten puzzling floors in order to rescue the lovely princess.

NES Relatives:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YoOVfPSevCQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TZw2gO2AJIU


NESGUIDE ARCHIVE INFO

The original NES gameplay archive, est 2007 includes gameplay captures from all commercial releases from the US market with a few extras (like famicom releases) just for fun. As of Dec 2024, I've resumed efforts to update some of the older (some 360p) videos with higher-def captures. Text updates will be posted to BlueSky (which doesn't require an account to view). Please follow there (or just bookmark the url) if you're interested!

https://bsky.app/profile/nesguide.com
